frame.name: Age
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> has existed for a length of time, the <fen>Age</fen>. The <fen>Age</fen> can be characterized as a value of the age <fen>Attribute</fen>, or a <fen>Degree</fen> modifier may express the deviation of the <fen>Age</fen> from the norm. The <fen>Expressor</fen> exhibits qualities of the age of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Entity">This building</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="Age">twenty thousand years</fex> <t>old</t>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Entity">My grandpa</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="Degree">really</fex> <t>old</t></ex>
<ex><fex name="Entity">Junior</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="Age">only five weeks</fex> <t>old</t>.</ex>
<ex>A cunning <t>oldish</t> <fex name="Expressor">voice</fex> called out from the crowd.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Entity">His</fex> <fex name="Attribute"><t>age</t></fex> was <fex name="Age">23</fex> <fex name="Time">at the time</fex>.</ex>
<ex> <fex name="Entity">People</fex> <m>of</m> <fex name="Attribute"><t>age</t></fex> <fex name="Age">55</fex> or older should consult their physician. </ex>
<ex>I have a <fex name="Age">13-year</fex>-<t>old</t> <fex name="Entity">cousin</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="Entity">My grandma</fex> <m>is</m> <t>old</t></ex>
There are additional patterns that the LUs in this frame occur in which are not licensed by a particular lexical head but by a construction. Additionally, there are patterns that evoke this frame without any overt lexical head that are part of this frame.
<ex>She is 45 years of <t>age</t>.</ex> <ex>Billy is 13.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular age is under consideration.
</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is a function of the amount of time that the <fen>Entity</fen> has existed.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s age.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Age</fen> from the norm.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is at a particular <fen>Age</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular <fen>Age</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Expressor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Frame Element <fen>Expressor</fen> marks expressions that indicate a body part, gesture or other expression of the <fen>Entity</fen> that reflect its age.
<ex>"Who's there?" she barked. "Ensign Kim, ma'me," the <t>youngish</t> <fex name="exp">voice</fex> of Voyager's young Harry Kim came over the comm line. "</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>Duration denotes the length of time from the beginning of a continuous situation to its end. In many cases, the continuous situation is a dynamic action which is ongoing, while in others it is simply an undifferentiated state.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: old.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having existed for a long time or of a specified age

lexUnit.name: young.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having lived or existed for only a short time; not far advanced in life

lexUnit.name: age.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the length of time that a person or thing has existed.

lexUnit.name: maturity.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the age at adulthood which, in animals, is defined as full sexual development, and in humans is culture specific
